Deprecated. 

getAllLdapUserProfiles

public static java.util.ArrayList<oracle.security.idm.UserProfile> getAllLdapUserProfiles(java.lang.Boolean isUpdateNewUsersOnly)
Fetches all the ldap users and returns the list of all user profiles if isUpdateNewUsersOnly set to false. If is UpdateNewUsers set to true, returns only the users with any of the user preferences options at LDAP is null.

Parameters:
isUpdateNewUsersOnly -
Returns:

Parameters:
paramName -
Returns:
true if the paramName is present in the list
